io.helidon.security.webserver.WebSecurity

    Package Description
    io.helidon.security.webserver
    Integration library for RxServer.

    • Uses of WebSecurity in io.helidon.security.webserver

      Methods in io.helidon.security.webserver that return WebSecurity 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static WebSecurity WebSecurity.from(Config config)
      Create a consumer of routing config to be registered with web server routing to process security requests.
      static WebSecurity WebSecurity.from(Security security)
      Create a consumer of routing config to be registered with web server routing to process security requests.
      static WebSecurity WebSecurity.from(Security security, Config config)
      Create a consumer of routing config to be registered with web server routing to process security requests.
      WebSecurity WebSecurity.securityDefaults(SecurityHandler defaultHandler)
      Create a new web security instance using the default handler as base defaults for all handlers used.
